data.lyric:
[ti:Never Be the Same]
[ar:Camila Cabello/Kane Brown]
[al:Never Be the Same]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Never Be the Same - Camila Cabello (卡米拉·卡贝洛)/Kane Brown
[00:02.99]Lyrics by：Camila Cabello/Adam Feeney/Leo Rami Dawod/Jacob Ludwig Olofsson/Noonie Bao/Sasha Yatchenko
[00:05.98]Composed by：Camila Cabello/Adam Feeney/Leo Rami Dawod/Jacob Ludwig Olofsson/Noonie Bao/Sasha Yatchenko
[00:08.97]Produced by：Frank Dukes
[00:11.96]Camila Cabello：
[00:14.96]Something must've gone wrong in my brain
[00:18.21]
[00:18.74]Got your chemicals all in my veins
[00:22.22]Feeling all the highs feeling all the pain
[00:25.55]
[00:29.66]Let go on the wheel it's the bullet lane
[00:32.85]
[00:33.39]Now I'm seeing red not thinking straight
[00:36.55]
[00:37.08]Blurring all the lines you intoxicate me
[00:41.07]
[00:43.58]Just like nicotine h****n M******e
[00:48.58]Suddenly I'm a fiend and you're all I need
[00:52.26]All I need
[00:53.77]
[00:54.90]Yeah you're all I need
[00:57.51]
[00:58.48]It's you babe
[01:00.46]And I'm a sucker for the way that you move babe
[01:04.21]And I could try to run but it would be useless
[01:07.86]You're to blame
[01:08.85]
[01:09.90]Just one hit of you I knew I'll never be the same
[01:13.39]It's you babe
[01:15.26]And I'm a sucker for the way that you move babe
[01:18.94]And I could try to run but it would be useless
[01:22.63]You're to blame
[01:23.49]
[01:24.43]Just one hit of you I knew I'll never ever ever be the same
[01:28.77]
[01:30.90]I'll never be the same
[01:32.71]
[01:34.56]I'll never be the same
[01:36.76]
[01:38.31]I'll never be the same
[01:39.37]Kane Brown：
[01:39.86]Never be the same
[01:42.09]
[01:43.45]Sneaking in L.A. when the lights are low
[01:46.40]
[01:47.26]Off of one touch I could overdose
[01:50.75]He said stop playing it safe
[01:52.25]Boy I wanna see you lose control
[01:55.75]
[01:57.02]Both：
[01:57.35]Just like nicotine h****n M******e
